            foreach clothes: item:

                    observe(clothes,"Check if the shirt is dirty")

def close_and_facing_washing_machine_basket(washing_machine:item, basket:item):
    # Determine if the washing machine and basket are in the correct positions
    symbol correct_positions = close(basket, washing_machine) and facing(basket, washing_machine)
    return correct_positions

behavior wash_shirt(shirt:item, washing_machine:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(shirt, washing_machine)
        # Place the shirt inside the washing machine
    
behavior close_the_washing_machine_door(washing_machine:item):
    body:
        achieve closed(washing_machine)
        # Close the washing machine door

behavior start_washing_machine(washing_machine:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(washing_machine)
        # Start the washing machine

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind basket_for_clothes_2006: item where:
            is_basket_for_clothes(basket_for_clothes_2006)
        #Select the basket for clothes instance
        bind clothes_shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(clothes_shirt) and inside(clothes_shirt, basket_for_clothes_2006)
        # Select the shirt located in the basket for clothes
        bind washing_machine: item where:
            is_washing_machine(washing_machine) and id[washing_machine]==2007
        # Select the washing machine with ID 2007
        
        assert close_and_facing_washing_machine_basket(washing_machine, basket_for_clothes_2006)
        # Ensure the washing machine and basket are in the correct positions
        
        wash_shirt(clothes_shirt, washing_machine)
        # Wash the shirt inside the washing machine
        close_the_washing_machine_door(washing_machine)
        # Close the washing machine door
        start_washing_machine(washing_machine)
        # Start the washing machine cycle

def has_water_or_recipient(ironing_board:item):
    # Function to check if the ironing board has water or is a recipient
    symbol has_water_or_recipient=exists o: item : (has_water(o) or recipient(o)) and close(o, ironi
ng_board)
    return has_water_or_recipient

behavior iron_shirt_with_iron(shirt:item, iron:item):
    body:
        achieve clean(shirt)
        # The shirt must be clean before ironing

        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board)
        # Select an ironing board

        if has_water_or_recipient(ironing_board):
            bind o: item where:
                (has_water(o) or recipient(o)) and close(o, ironing_board)
            achieve is_on(iron)
            # Ensure the iron is turned on

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt)
        # Select the shirt

        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron)
        # Select the iron

        iron_shirt_with_iron(shirt, iron)

Goal Representation:
behavior iron_shirt(shirt:item, iron:item, ironing_board:item):
    body:
        achieve on(shirt, ironing_board) # Ensure the shirt is on the ironing board
        achieve plugged(iron) # Ensure the iron is plugged in
        achieve is_on(iron) # Ensure the iron is turned on

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and clean(shirt) and close_char(char, shirt)
        # Select the clean shirt that is close to the character
        
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron) and close_char(char, iron) 
        # Select the iron that is close to the character

        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board) and on(shirt, ironing_board)
        # Select the ironing board where the shirt is

        iron_shirt(shirt, iron, ironing_board) # Call behavior to iron the shirt

behavior iron_the_shirt(shirt:item, iron:item, ironing_board:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(iron)
        achieve on(shirt, ironing_board)
        achieve clean(shirt)

behavior reset_iron(iron:item):
    body:
        achieve is_off(iron)
        achieve unplugged(iron)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and id[shirt] == 2086
        bind iron: item where:
            is_iron(iron) and id[iron] == 2089
        bind ironing_board: item where:
            is_ironing_board(ironing_board) and id[ironing_board] == 2074
        iron_the_shirt(shirt, iron, ironing_board)
        reset_iron(iron)
